H0.text: Who would do anything for love (but not that). Romeo

H1.text: Who would do anything for love (but not that). Tristan

H2.text: Who would do anything for love (but not that). Orpheus

H3.text: Who would do anything for love (but not that). Meatloaf

A4.text: The single 'I'd Do Anything for Love (But I Won't Do That)' reached number one in 28 countries.

A5.text: Meat Loaf won the Grammy Award for Best Rock Vocal Performance, Solo for 'I'd Do Anything for Love.'
